IF(NOT CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

### VERSION ###
DKSET(FAR_VERSION FAR-2.0.2-win)

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(https://sourceforge.net/projects/findandreplace/files/findandreplace/2.0.2/${FAR_VERSION}.zip ${FAR_VERSION} ${FAR_VERSION})
## DKINSTALL(${DKWEB}/Download/${FAR_VERSION}.zip far)
DKSET(FAR ${3RDPARTY}/far)
